name: Zhenzhe Zheng
content: Zhenzhe Zheng (郑臻哲） Zhenzhe Zheng Home Research Group Teaching Honors Services Resume Zhenzhe Zheng (郑臻哲） Professor, Ph.D. Advisor, School of Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University 3-509 SEIEE Building 800 Dongchuan Road Shanghai 200240, P.R. China E-mail: zhengzhenzhe [@] sjtu [DOT] edu [DOT] cn About me Welcome to my homepage! I am currently a professor in the School of Computer Science @ Shanghai Jiao Tong University. I received my Ph.D. from the CS department @ Shanghai Jiao Tong University in March 2018. My advisors were Prof. Prof. Fan Wu and Prof. Guihai Chen. I was a visiting research scholar and then a postdoctoral researcher in the Coordinated Science Laboratory (CSL) @ UIUC from September 2016 to October 2019, advised by Prof. R. Srikant. I am the recipient of the China Computer Federation (CCF) Excellent Doctoral Dissertation Award in 2018. During my Ph.D. program, I was supported by Google Ph.D. Fellowship and Microsoft Research Asia Ph.D. Fellowship. My research interests are in the intersection of economics, learning and system. In particular, I have focused on game theory, machine learning, mobile computing and their applications for Agentic AI system, such as On-device AI Agent and Multi-agents online platform markets. Students: I am constantly looking for well motivated students (both undergrad and graduate) who are interested in game theory, machine learning and reinforcement learning, mobile computing, performance analysis and algorithm design, and system implementations. Please email me if you are interested. Recent News [2025.09] Our Paper ’’Optimizing Storage Overhead of User Behavior Log for ML-embedded Mobile Apps’’ has been accepted to ACM SIGMETRICS 2026. Congratulations to Chen! [2025.09] Our Paper ’’Optimizing Feature Extraction for On-Device Model Inference with User Behavior Sequences’’ has been accepted to ACM SenSys 2026. Congratulations to Chen! [2025.08] We have two papers ’’Online Contract Design for Creator Economy in the Era of GenAI’’ and ’’DRAGON: Enhancing On-Device Model Performance with Distributed Retrieval-Augmented Generation’’ accepted to ACM MobiHoc, 2025, Congratulations to Yumou and Shangyu! [2025.07] We have two papers ’’User Context Generation for Large Language Models from Mobile Sensing Data’’ and ’’From Non-IID to IID: Mobility-aware Hierarchical Federated Learning with Client-Edge Association Control’’ accepted to IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC), Congratulations to Rui and Haibo! [2025.05] We have five papers accepted to ACM SIGKDD, 2025, February Cycle. Congratulations to Chen, Qilong, Chufeng, Yidan and Jianqing! [2025.01] Our Paper ’’Enabling Real-Time Inference in Online Continual Learning via Device-Cloud Collaboration’’ has been accepted to ACM WWW 2025. Congratulations to Haibo! [2025.01] I will serve as a TPC member for ACM MobiHoc 2025, IEEE WiOpt 2025, ACM KDD 2025, IJCAI 2025. [2024.12] Our Paper ’’Learning Optimal Auctions with Correlated Value Distributions’’ has been accepted to AAAI 2025. Congratulations to Da! [2024.12] Our Paper ’’Latency-aware Online Continual Learning for Non-Stationary Data Streams’’ has been accepted to IEEE INFOCOM 2025. Congratulations to Haibo! [2024.11] We have two papers ’’Contextual Generative Auction with Permutation-level Externalities for Online Advertising’’ and ’’Prices Do Matter: Modeling Price Competitiveness for Online Hotel Industry’’ accepted to ACM SIGKDD, 2025. Congratulations to Ruitao! [2024.11] Our Paper ’’MIDDLE: A Mobility-Driven Device-Edge-Cloud Federated Learning Framework’’ has been accepted to IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC). Congratulations to Songli! [2024.09] Our Paper ’’LiteMoE: Customizing On-device LLM Serving via Proxy Submodel Tuning’’ has been accepted to ACM SenSys 2024. Congratulations to Yan! [2024.07] Our Paper ’’On the Analysis of Two-Stage Stochastic Bandit’’ has been accepted to ACM MobiHoc 2024. Congratulations to Yumou! [2024.06] Our Paper ’’Delta: A Cloud-assisted Data Enrichment Framework for On-Device Continual Learning’’ has been accepted to ACM MobiCom 2024. Congratulations to Chen! [2024.06] Our Paper ’’Nebula: An Edge-Cloud Collaborative Learning Framework for Dynamic Edge Environments’’ has been accepted to ACM ICPP 2024. Congratulations to Yan! [2024.05] We have three papers ’’Preventing Strategic Behaviors in Collaborative Inference for Vertical Federated Learning’’, ’’Robust Auto-Bidding Strategies for Online Advertising’’ and ’’Truthful Bandit Mechanisms for Repeated Two-stage Ad Auctions’’ been accepted to ACM SIGKDD, 2024. Congratulations to Yidan, Qilong and Haoming! [2024.04] Paper ’’Mobility-Aware Device Sampling for Statistical Heterogeneity in Hierarchical Federated Learning’’ has been accepted to IEEE ICDCS, 2024. Congratulations to Songli! [2024.04] Paper ’’On Designing Market Model and Pricing Mechanisms for IoT Data Exchange’’ has been accepted to IEEE TMC, 2024. [2024.01] Paper ’’Trajectory-wise Iterative Reinforcement Learning Framework for Auto-bidding’’ has been accepted to ACM WWW, 2024. Congratulations to Haoming! [2024.01] Paper ’’ODE: An Online Data Selection Framework for Federated Learning in Mobile Networks’’ has been accepted to IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking (TON), 2024. Congratulations to Chen! Research Interests Agentic AI On-device Machine Learning Large-scale Decision Making
